    • Markov Chain model

Associate (Patient, Time) pairs to corresponding index in the model

get_index.Rd

Associate (Patient, Time) pairs to corresponding index in the model

get_index(train, test = NULL)

get_index2(N_patient, t_max)

Arguments

train

Training dataframe
test

Testing dataframe
N_patient

Number of patients
t_max

Vector of size N_patient indicating the time-series length

Value

Dataframe with columns Patient, Time, Index

Details

For more details, see the vignette

Examples

library(dplyr)

#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
id <- get_index2(N_patient = 10, t_max = rpois(10, 20))
df <- id %>% select(-Index) %>% slice_sample(prop = 0.9) %>% arrange(Patient, Time)
get_index(train = df)
